name: Midnight Special
summary_text: A father and son go on the run, pursued by the government and a cult drawn to the child's special powers.

name: The Family
summary_text: The Manzoni family, a notorious mafia clan, is relocated to Normandy, France under the Witness Protection Program, where fitting in soon becomes challenging, as their old habits die hard.

name: Silver Spoons
summary_text: Ricky Stratton is a spoiled rich kid who lives the life that many kids dream of, but he still suffers from the problems that many teens do.

name: Initiation
summary_text: Whiton University unravels the night a star-athlete is murdered, kicking off a spree of social media slayings that force students to uncover the truth behind the school's hidden secrets and the horrifying meaning of an exclamation point.

name: Friday Night Lights
summary_text: Based on H.G. Bissinger's book, which profiled the economically depressed town of Odessa, Texas and their heroic high school football team, The Permian High Panthers.

name: Milk
summary_text: The story of Harvey Milk and his struggles as an American gay activist who fought for gay rights and became California's first openly gay elected official.

name: Hunter
summary_text: Rick Hunter is a renegade cop who bends the rules and takes justice into his own hands. Partnered with the equally stunning and rebellious Sgt. McCall, the tough-minded duo set out to crack down on L.A.'s slimiest criminals.

name: Tron
summary_text: A computer hacker is abducted into the digital world and forced to participate in gladiatorial games where his only chance of escape is with the help of a heroic security program.

name: SurrealEstate
summary_text: Realtor Nick Roman and an elite team of specialists handle the cases that no one else can: haunted and possessed houses that literally scare would-be buyers away.

name: Isn't It Romantic
summary_text: A young woman disenchanted with love mysteriously finds herself trapped inside a romantic comedy.

name: What a Girl Wants
summary_text: An American teenager learns that her father is a wealthy British politician running for office. Although she is eager to find him, she realizes it could cause a scandal and cost him the election.

name: Far from the Madding Crowd
summary_text: In Victorian England, the independent and headstrong Bathsheba Everdene attracts three very different suitors: Gabriel Oak, a sheep farmer; Frank Troy, a reckless Sergeant; and William Boldwood, a prosperous and mature bachelor.

name: UHF
summary_text: An unemployed visionary becomes the manager of a local television station. The station becomes a success, with all sorts of hilarious sight gags and wacky humor.

name: Universal Soldier
summary_text: Two rival soldiers who were killed in Vietnam are brought back to life in a top secret military experiment that creates superhuman warriors.

name: Goodnight Mommy
summary_text: Twin boys move to a new house with their mother after she has face-changing cosmetic surgery, but under the bandages is someone the boys don't recognize.

name: Son
summary_text: When a young boy contracts a mysterious illness, his mother must decide how far she will go to protect him from terrifying forces in her past.

name: Lady in the Water
summary_text: Apartment building superintendent Cleveland Heep rescues what he thinks is a young woman from the pool he maintains. When he discovers that she is actually a character from a bedtime story who is trying to make the journey back to her home, he works with his tenants to protect his new friend from the creatures that are determined to keep her in our world.

name: Gnomeo & Juliet
summary_text: Separated by a garden fence and a feud, are blue gnomes on one side and red gnomes on the other. This doesn't stop blue Gnomeo and red Juliet from falling in love with each other. Do they have a future together?

name: Dickie Roberts: Former Child Star
summary_text: A thirty-something former child star hires a foster family to re-create the childhood he never had.

name: Escape from L.A.
summary_text: Snake Plissken is once again called in by the United States government to recover a potential doomsday device from Los Angeles, now an autonomous island where undesirables are deported.

name: Hotel Transylvania 2
summary_text: Dracula and his friends try to bring out the monster in his half human, half vampire grandson in order to keep Mavis from leaving the hotel.

name: Airheads
summary_text: Three band members hoping for a big break head to a radio station to play their demo tape and wind up holding everyone hostage with plastic guns when the head D.J. refuses to play them.

name: The Restaurant
summary_text: Stockholm, the day of peace in Europe 1945. A spontaneous kiss between two strangers, during the celebration at Kungsgatan, will have major consequences.

name: Home Again
summary_text: Life for a single mom in Los Angeles takes an unexpected turn when she allows three young guys to move in with her.

name: The Vigil
summary_text: A man providing overnight watch to a deceased member of his former Orthodox Jewish community finds himself opposite a malevolent entity, in writer-director Keith Thomas' electrifying feature debut.

name: Nanny McPhee
summary_text: A governess uses magic to rein in the behavior of seven ne'er-do-well children in her charge.

name: Kung Fu Panda 2
summary_text: Po and his friends fight to stop a peacock villain from conquering China with a deadly new weapon, but first the Dragon Warrior must come to terms with his past.

name: Rambo III
summary_text: Rambo mounts a one-man mission to rescue his friend Colonel Trautman from the clutches of the formidable invading Soviet forces in Afghanistan.

name: Deadwood: The Movie
summary_text: As the residents of Deadwood gather to commemorate Dakota's statehood in 1889, saloon owner Al Swearengen and Marshal Seth Bullock clash with Senator George Hearst.

name: Angel Eyes
summary_text: A mysterious man is drawn to a feisty female police officer and a unusual relationship ensues, as not everything is as it seems.

name: Flight of the Conchords
summary_text: Bret and Jemaine are Flight of the Conchords, a folk-rock band from New Zealand living in New York City in search of stardom.

name: Three Amigos!
summary_text: Three actors accept an invitation to a Mexican village to perform their onscreen bandit fighter roles, unaware that it is the real thing.

name: Aliens vs. Predator: Requiem
summary_text: Warring Alien and Predator races descend on a rural Colorado town, where unsuspecting residents must band together for any chance of survival.

name: House of Lies
summary_text: Charming, fast-talking Marty Kaan and his crack team of management consultants use every dirty trick in the book to woo powerful CEOs and close huge deals in this scathing, irreverent satire of corporate America today.

name: No Way Out
summary_text: A coverup and witchhunt occur after a politician accidentally kills his mistress.

name: Legally Blonde 2
summary_text: Elle Woods heads to Washington, D.C. to join the staff of a Representative in order to pass a bill to ban animal testing.

name: Cardinal
summary_text: Cardinal struggles to right past wrongs that could derail his investigation and end his career, as the case grows more violent and twisted and the clock ticks down on the killer's next victim.

name: Elizabeth
summary_text: The early years of the reign of Elizabeth I of England and her difficult task of learning what is necessary to be a monarch.

name: RV
summary_text: Bob Munro and his dysfunctional family rent an RV for a road trip to the Colorado Rockies, where they ultimately have to contend with a bizarre community of campers.

name: Word of Honor
summary_text: Zhou Zi Shu gets embroiled in a conspiracy in the martial arts world. He meets Wen Ke Xing who escapes from the Ghost Valley to avenge his parents' deaths. They become fast friends and embark on an adventure to find a legendary treasure.

name: Stealth
summary_text: Deeply ensconced in a top-secret military program, three pilots struggle to bring an artificial intelligence program under control before it initiates the next world war.

name: Lady Macbeth
summary_text: In 19th-century rural England, a young bride who has been sold into marriage discovers an unstoppable desire within herself as she enters into an affair with a worker on her estate.

name: Defiance
summary_text: Life in the city of Defiance, in a near future after the arrival of different alien lifeforms to Earth.

name: Ned's Declassified School Survival Guide
summary_text: Ned Bigby shares his advice on how to survive middle school.

name: The 13th Warrior
summary_text: A man, having fallen in love with the wrong woman, is sent by the sultan himself on a diplomatic mission to a distant land as an ambassador. Stopping at a Viking village port to restock on supplies, he finds himself unwittingly embroiled in a quest to banish a mysterious threat in a distant Viking land.

name: The Score
summary_text: An aging thief hopes to retire and live off his ill-gotten wealth when a young kid convinces him into doing one last heist.

name: Beverly Hills Cop II
summary_text: Axel Foley returns to Beverly Hills to help Taggart and Rosewood investigate Chief Bogomil's near-fatal shooting and the series of "alphabet crimes" associated with it.

name: Leave No Trace
summary_text: A father and his thirteen-year-old daughter are living an ideal existence in a vast urban park in Portland, Oregon when a small mistake derails their lives forever.

name: Zookeeper
summary_text: A group of zoo animals decide to break their code of silence in order to help their lovable zookeeper find love, without opting to leave his current job for something more illustrious.

name: Patriots Day
summary_text: The story of the 2013 Boston Marathon bombing and the aftermath, which includes the city-wide manhunt to find the terrorists responsible.

name: Night in Paradise
summary_text: Hiding out in Jeju Island following a brutal tragedy, a wronged mobster with a target on his back connects with a woman who has her own demons.

name: Leviathan
summary_text: Perched on the hull of a wrecked Soviet freighter, a team of deep-sea miners led by head oceanographer Steven Beck comes face to face with a mutant creature that's the product of a failed genetic experiment.

name: The Last Letter from Your Lover
summary_text: A pair of interwoven stories, set in the past and present, follow an ambitious journalist determined to solve the mystery of a forbidden love affair at the center of a trove of secret love letters from 1965.

name: Kakegurui
summary_text: A gambling prodigy comes to an elite school run by games and turns the order upside down.

name: Haunt
summary_text: On Halloween, a group of friends encounter an "extreme" haunted house that promises to feed on their darkest fears. The night turns deadly as they come to the horrifying realization that some nightmares are real.

name: God of War
summary_text: After wiping out the gods of Mount Olympus, Kratos moves on to the frigid lands of Scandinavia, where he and his son must embark on an odyssey across a dangerous world of gods and monsters.

name: World on Fire
summary_text: WWII drama centered on the lives of ordinary people affected by the war.

name: Georgetown
summary_text: Ulrich Mott, an ambitious social climber, marries a wealthy widow in Washington D.C. in order to mix with powerful political players.

name: Evilspeak
summary_text: An outcast military cadet taps into a way to summon demons and cast spells on his tormentors through his computer.

name: Frances Ha
summary_text: A New York woman (who doesn't really have an apartment) apprentices for a dance company (though she's not really a dancer) and throws herself headlong into her dreams, even as the possibility of realizing them dwindles.

name: Free Willy
summary_text: When a boy learns that a beloved killer whale is to be killed by the aquarium owners, the boy risks everything to free the whale.

name: Drunk History
summary_text: Historical reenactments by A-list talent are presented by inebriated storytellers.

name: The Current War
summary_text: The dramatic story of the cutthroat race between electricity titans Thomas A. Edison and George Westinghouse to determine whose electrical system would power the modern world.

name: Alexa & Katie
summary_text: Lifelong best friends Alexa Mendoza and Katie Cooper are anticipating the start of their freshman year of high school. They confront a crisis that leaves them feeling like outsiders at a time when fitting in is what seems to matter most.

name: Tully
summary_text: A struggling mother of three forms an unexpected bond with the night nanny hired to help with her newborn baby.

name: Romance on the High Seas
summary_text: Romantic misunderstandings abound when spouses suspect each other of being unfaithful, and a nightclub singer takes a cruise under a false identity.

name: The Santa Clause
summary_text: When a man inadvertently makes Santa fall off of his roof on Christmas Eve, he finds himself magically recruited to take his place.

name: Pain and Glory
summary_text: A film director reflects on the choices he's made in life as the past and present come crashing down around him.

name: The Long Goodbye
summary_text: Private investigator Philip Marlowe helps a friend out of a jam, but in doing so gets implicated in his wife's murder.

name: Uncle Vanya
summary_text: Uncle Vanya is a thoughtful and contemplative story of Russian friends and relatives living on an estate with thousands of trees. Written by one of Russia's greatest playwrights, it deals ...                See full summary »

name: The Strangers: Prey at Night
summary_text: A family of four staying at a secluded mobile home park for the night are stalked and then hunted by three masked psychopaths.

name: The Changeling
summary_text: After the death of his wife and daughter in a car crash, a music professor staying at an old mansion is dragged into a decades-old mystery by an inexplicable presence in the mansion's attic.

name: A Wrinkle in Time
summary_text: After the disappearance of her scientist father, three peculiar beings send Meg, her brother, and her friend to space in order to find him.

name: Brimstone
summary_text: From the moment the new reverend climbs the pulpit, Liz knows she and her family are in great danger.

name: Helstrom
summary_text: Daimon and Ana Helstrom are the son and daughter of a mysterious and powerful serial killer. The siblings have a complicated dynamic as they track down the terrorizing worst of humanity - each with their attitude and skills.

name: The Half of It
summary_text: When smart but cash-strapped teen Ellie Chu agrees to write a love letter for a jock, she doesn't expect to become his friend - or fall for his crush.

name: Time Trap
summary_text: A professor enters a cave and goes missing. Some of his students come looking for him and get trapped in the cave as well.

name: Death Stranding
summary_text: Deliveryman Sam Porter must travel across a ravaged wasteland and reconnect the city states of America formed after a mysterious apocalyptic event dubbed 'death stranding' left the world in ruins and plagued by supernatural tar creatures.

name: Cannibal Troll
summary_text: A group of female friends on a hen weekend in the countryside find themselves hunted by a beastly - and very hungry - troll.

name: Take Back
summary_text: Zara (Gillian White) and Brian (Michael Jai White) are living the perfect small town life when a mysterious stranger from Zara's secret past kidnaps their daughter and now they must race to save her life.

name: 22 July
summary_text: A three-part story of Norway's worst terrorist attack in which over seventy people were killed. 22 July looks at the disaster itself, the survivors, Norway's political system and the lawyers who worked on this horrific case.

name: The Words
summary_text: A writer at the peak of his literary success discovers the steep price he must pay for stealing another man's work.

name: The Beastmaster
summary_text: A sword-and-sorcery fantasy about a young man's search for revenge. Armed with supernatural powers, the handsome hero and his animal allies wage war against marauding forces.

name: The Taking of Deborah Logan
summary_text: An elderly woman battling Alzheimer's disease agrees to let a film crew document her condition, but what they discover is something far more sinister going on.

name: Big Stan
summary_text: A weak con man panics when he learns he's going to prison for fraud. He hires a mysterious martial arts guru who helps transform him into a martial arts expert who can fight off inmates who want to hurt or love him.

name: Trippin' with the Kandasamys
summary_text: To rekindle their marriages, best friends-turned-in-laws Shanthi and Jennifer plan a couples' getaway. But it comes with all kinds of surprises.

name: The Man Who Killed Don Quixote
summary_text: Toby, a disillusioned film director, is pulled into a world of time-jumping fantasy when a Spanish cobbler believes himself to be Sancho Panza. He gradually becomes unable to tell dreams from reality.

name: Cellular
summary_text: A young man receives an emergency phone call on his cell phone from an older woman. The catch? The woman claims to have been kidnapped; and the kidnappers have targeted her husband and child next.

name: Girl House
summary_text: A beautiful young college student moves into a house that streams video to an X-rated website. After a deranged fan hacks the site and finds out where she lives, she spends the night fighting for her life.

name: Deja Vu
summary_text: After a ferry is bombed in New Orleans, an A.T.F. agent joins a unique investigation using experimental surveillance technology to find the bomber, but soon finds himself becoming obsessed with one of the victims.

name: Resistance
summary_text: The story of mime Marcel Marceau as he works with a group of Jewish boy scouts and the French Resistance to save the lives of ten thousand orphans during World War II.

name: Explorers
summary_text: A boy obsessed with '50s sci-fi movies about aliens has a recurring dream about a blueprint of some kind, which he draws for his inventor friend. With the help of a third kid, they follow it and build themselves a spaceship. Now what?

name: The Apartment
summary_text: A man tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but complications and a romance of his own ensue.

name: Diner
summary_text: A group of college-age buddies struggle with their imminent passage into adulthood in 1959 Baltimore.

name: Final Destination 2
summary_text: Kimberly has a premonition of an accident killing multiple people including her and her friends. She blocks the cars behind her on the ramp and as a police trooper arrives, the accident happens. Death is stalking this group of survivors.

name: King Richard
summary_text: A look at how tennis superstars Venus and Serena Williams became who they are after the coaching from their father Richard Williams.

name: Lincoln Rhyme: Hunt for the Bone Collector
summary_text: A retired forensic criminologist teams up with an ambitious young detective to help capture some of the most dangerous criminals in America.

name: Red Shoes and the Seven Dwarfs
summary_text: Princes who have been turned into Dwarfs seek the red shoes of a lady in order to break the spell, although it will not be easy. A parody with a twist.

name: Pinocchio
summary_text: A live-action adaptation of Disney's 'Pinocchio'.

name: Malcolm X
summary_text: Biographical epic of the controversial and influential Black Nationalist leader, from his early life and career as a small-time gangster, to his ministry as a member of the Nation of Islam.

name: Indestructible Man
summary_text: Charles "The Butcher" Benton, a brutal death row inmate gets double-crossed by his crooked lawyer. He gets his chance for revenge when, after he's been executed, a bizarre experiment brings him back to life and more deadly than ever.

name: Sunshine Cleaning
summary_text: In order to raise the tuition to send her young son to private school, a mom starts an unusual business -- a biohazard removal/crime scene clean-up service -- with her unreliable sister.

name: Prisoners of the Ghostland
summary_text: A notorious criminal must break an evil curse in order to rescue an abducted girl who has mysteriously disappeared.

name: What Dreams May Come
summary_text: Chris Nielsen dies in an accident, and enters Heaven. But when he discovers that his beloved wife Annie has killed herself out of grief over the loss, he embarks on an afterlife adventure to reunite with her.

name: A Little Princess
summary_text: A young girl is relegated to servitude at a boarding school when her father goes missing and is presumed dead.

name: Set It Up
summary_text: Two corporate executive assistants hatch a plan to match-make their two bosses.

name: The Perfection
summary_text: When troubled musical prodigy Charlotte seeks out Elizabeth, the new star pupil of her former school, the encounter sends both musicians down a sinister path with shocking consequences.

name: Parenthood
summary_text: The Buckmans are a midwestern family all dealing with their lives: estranged relatives, raising children, pressures of the job, and learning to be a good parent and spouse.

name: Downsizing
summary_text: A social satire in which a man realizes he would have a better life if he were to shrink himself to five inches tall, allowing him to live in wealth and splendor.

name: Bliss
summary_text: A newly married happy couple visits a sex therapist to determine why the wife can't achieve an orgasm with her husband. This causes a horrific suppressed memory to emerge and she becomes more and more distant.

name: Titanic II
summary_text: A century after the fateful voyage of the original, modern luxury liner Titanic II sets sail. Will this ship suffer the same fate as her namesake?

name: Paterson
summary_text: A quiet observation of the triumphs and defeats of daily life, along with the poetry evident in its smallest details.

name: Hercules: The Legendary Journeys
summary_text: Hercules, aided by his best friend Iolaus, goes on many adventures helping people and slaying mythical monsters using his half-god strength.

name: Just One of the Guys
summary_text: Terry feels discriminated against when the summer jobs at Sun Tribune go to 2 guys. She decides to do something about it. She dresses like a guy and gets a haircut. Will students at the other high school notice? Girls notice "him".

name: From Hell
summary_text: In Victorian-era London, a troubled clairvoyant police detective investigates the murders of Jack the Ripper.

name: Good Burger
summary_text: A dim-witted teenager and his new coworker try to save the old burger joint they work for from failing after the opening of a brand new burger restaurant across the street, which's planning to put them out of business.

name: The Naked Gun 2½: The Smell of Fear
summary_text: Lieutenant Frank Drebin discovers that his ex-girlfriend's new beau is involved in a plot to kidnap a scientist who advocates solar energy.

name: Solaris
summary_text: A psychologist is sent to a station orbiting a distant planet in order to discover what has caused the crew to go insane.

name: All That Jazz
summary_text: Director/choreographer Bob Fosse tells his own life story as he details the sordid career of Joe Gideon, a womanizing, drug-using dancer.

name: Nurses
summary_text: The series follows five young nurses working on the front lines of St. Mary's Hospital dedicating their lives to helping others, while figuring out how to help themselves.

name: The Last Boy Scout
summary_text: A private detective's protected female witness is murdered, prompting him and the victim's boyfriend to investigate the crime that leads to a corrupt politician and a crooked football team owner.

name: Octopussy
summary_text: A fake Fabergé egg, and a fellow Agent's death, lead James Bond to uncover an international jewel-smuggling operation, headed by the mysterious Octopussy, being used to disguise a nuclear attack on N.A.T.O. forces.

name: Yours, Mine and Ours
summary_text: A widower with ten children falls for a widow with eight, and they must decide about forming a huge, unconventional family.

name: The Ugly Truth
summary_text: An uptight television producer takes control of a morning show segment on modern relationships hosted by a misogynistic man.

name: While You Were Sleeping
summary_text: A hopelessly romantic Chicago Transit Authority token collector is mistaken for the fiancée of a coma patient.

name: The Stepfather
summary_text: Michael Harding (Penn Badgely) returns home from military school to find his mother Susan (Sela Ward) happily in love and living with her new boyfriend David (Dylan Walsh). As the two men get to know each other, he becomes more and more suspicious of the man who is always there with a helpful hand.

name: Yakuza and the Family
summary_text: Kenji Yamamoto's father died from using a stimulant drug. His life fell into desperation. Kenji then joined a crime syndicate. There, he meets the gang's boss Hiroshi Shibasaki. Hiroshi ...                See full summary »

name: Waves
summary_text: Traces the journey of a suburban family - led by a well-intentioned but domineering father - as they navigate love, forgiveness, and coming together in the aftermath of a loss.

name: Underworld: Rise of the Lycans
summary_text: An origins story centered on the centuries-old feud between the race of aristocratic vampires and their onetime slaves, the Lycans.

name: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre
summary_text: Another sequel to the original, The Texas Chain Saw Massacre.

name: U Turn
summary_text: A man heading to Vegas to pay off his gambling debt before the Russian mafia kills him is forced to stop in an Arizona town where everything that can go wrong does go wrong.

name: AJ and the Queen
summary_text: Ruby Red, a down-on-her-luck drag queen traveling across America, develops an unlikely sidekick named AJ.

name: Blue Streak
summary_text: A former convict poses as a cop to retrieve a diamond he stole years ago.

name: Babyteeth
summary_text: Milla, a seriously ill teenager, falls in love with a drug dealer, Moses, her parents' worst nightmare.

name: Flight of the Navigator
summary_text: In 1978, a boy travels 8 years into the future and has an adventure with an intelligent, wisecracking alien ship.

name: Insidious: The Dark Realm
summary_text: A demonic entity attempts to unleash chaos into the world of the living.

name: Flight Command
summary_text: A rookie flyer, Ens. Alan Drake, joins the famous Hellcats Squadron right out of flight school in Pensacola. He doesn't make a great first impression when he is forced to ditch his airplane...                See full summary »

name: The Spiderwick Chronicles
summary_text: Upon moving into the run-down Spiderwick Estate with their mother, twin brothers Jared and Simon Grace, along with their sister Mallory, find themselves pulled into an alternate world full of faeries and other creatures.

name: Buried
summary_text: Paul is a U.S. truck driver working in Iraq. After an attack by a group of Iraqis he wakes to find he is buried alive inside a coffin. With only a lighter and a cell phone it's a race against time to escape this claustrophobic death trap.

name: Gangster Squad
summary_text: It's 1949 Los Angeles, the city is run by gangsters and a malicious mobster, Mickey Cohen. Determined to end the corruption, John O'Mara assembles a team of cops, ready to take down the ruthless leader and restore peace to the city.

name: From Now
summary_text: The series begins when the USS HOPE, a famed lost spaceship, returns to Earth after vanishing 35 years prior. The lone survivor, voiced by Madden, disembarks mysteriously looking the exact ...                See full summary »

name: Contraband
summary_text: To protect his brother-in-law from a drug lord, a former smuggler heads to Panama to score millions of dollars in counterfeit bills.

name: The Last of Us
summary_text: In a hostile, post-pandemic world, Joel and Ellie, brought together by desperate circumstances, must rely on each other to survive a brutal journey across what remains of the United States.

name: Stuber
summary_text: A detective recruits his Uber driver into an unexpected night of adventure.

name: The Negotiator
summary_text: In a desperate attempt to prove his innocence, a skilled police negotiator accused of corruption and murder takes hostages in a government office to gain the time he needs to find the truth.

name: The Inspector Lynley Mysteries
summary_text: British crime investigation series based around aristocratic, Oxford-educated Detective Inspector Thomas Lynley ( Nathaniel Parker ) and his working-class assistant Sergeant Barbara Havers ( Sharon Small ).

name: RuPaul's Drag Race All Stars
summary_text: New show will serve up a new twist on the mega-hit RuPaul's Drag Race as it pits queens from previous seasons in a wig-to-wig drag battle royale.

name: The Frighteners
summary_text: After a tragic car accident that kills his wife, a man discovers he can communicate with the dead to con people. However, when a demonic spirit appears, he may be the only one who can stop it from killing the living and the dead.

name: Day of the Dead
summary_text: As the world is overrun by zombies, a small group of scientists and military personnel dwelling in an underground bunker in Florida must determine whether they should educate, eliminate or escape the undead horde.

name: Next
summary_text: A Las Vegas magician who can see into the future is pursued by FBI agents seeking to use his abilities to prevent a nuclear terrorist attack.

name: The Right Stuff
summary_text: The story of the original Mercury 7 astronauts and their macho, seat-of-the-pants approach to the space program.

name: A Separation
summary_text: A married couple are faced with a difficult decision - to improve the life of their child by moving to another country or to stay in Iran and look after a deteriorating parent who has Alzheimer's disease.

name: The Alamo
summary_text: In 1836, a small band of soldiers sacrifice their lives in hopeless combat against a massive army in order to prevent a tyrant from smashing the new Republic of Texas.

name: The Man in the Iron Mask
summary_text: The cruel King Louis XIV of France has a secret twin brother whom he keeps imprisoned. Can the twin be substituted for the real king?

name: Attack the Block
summary_text: A teen gang in South London defend their block from an alien invasion.

name: Blue Jasmine
summary_text: A New York socialite, deeply troubled and in denial, arrives in San Francisco to impose upon her sister. She looks a million, but isn't bringing money, peace, or love...

name: Hard Target
summary_text: A woman hires a drifter as her guide through New Orleans in search of her missing father. In the process, they discover a deadly game of cat and mouse behind his disappearance.

name: The Mustang
summary_text: While participating in a rehabilitation program training wild mustangs, a convict at first struggles to connect with the horses and his fellow inmates, but he learns to confront his violent past as he soothes an especially feisty horse.

name: Grease 2
summary_text: A British student at a 1960s American high school must prove himself to the leader of a girls' gang whose members can only date greasers.

name: The Mallorca Files
summary_text: A British and German detective clashing over how to police the Spanish island of Mallorca.

name: Rurouni Kenshin Part III: The Legend Ends
summary_text: Shishio has set sail in his ironclad ship to bring down the Meiji government and return Japan to chaos, carrying Kaoru with him. In order to stop him in time, Kenshin trains with his old master to learn his final technique.

name: Metástasis
summary_text: A Colombian remake of the U.S. TV show Breaking Bad. After he is diagnosed with cancer, Walter Blanco teams up with José Miguel Rosas in order to sell crystal meth.

name: Safety Not Guaranteed
summary_text: Three magazine employees head out on an assignment to interview a guy who placed a classified advertisement seeking a companion for time travel.

name: The Gymnast
summary_text: Jane left gymnastics when an injury killed Olympics hope. Now 43, she gets a chance to perform a demanding "dance" in the air with Serena. The intimate act makes her forget her dead marriage.

name: The Split
summary_text: The Defoes, a family of female divorce lawyers, are forced to face their past following the return of their estranged father after a 30 year absence.

name: Planet Earth
summary_text: Emmy Award-winning, 11 episodes, five years in the making, the most expensive nature documentary series ever commissioned by the BBC, and the first to be filmed in high definition.

name: The Living Daylights
summary_text: James Bond is sent to investigate a KGB policy to kill all enemy spies and uncovers an arms deal that potentially has major global ramifications.

name: The Great Wall
summary_text: In ancient China, a group of European mercenaries encounters a secret army that maintains and defends the Great Wall of China against a horde of monstrous creatures.

name: The Snowman
summary_text: Detective Harry Hole investigates the disappearance of a woman whose scarf is found wrapped around an ominous-looking snowman.

name: Stockholm Syndrome
summary_text: Musician and cultural icon A$AP Rocky explores his life and career while fighting for his freedom after being arrested in Stockholm, Sweden and placed in solitary confinement.

name: The Good Liar
summary_text: Consummate con man Roy Courtnay has set his sights on his latest mark: the recently widowed Betty McLeish, worth millions. But this time, what should have been a simple swindle escalates into a cat-and-mouse game with the ultimate stakes.

name: The Innocents
summary_text: When teenagers Harry and June run away from their repressive families to be together, they're derailed by an extraordinary discovery - June's ability to shape-shift. A scientist tries to capture her and discover the key to her power.

name: Mississippi Burning
summary_text: Two F.B.I. Agents with wildly different styles arrive in Mississippi to investigate the disappearance of some civil rights activists.

name: The Head
summary_text: Winter has fallen on the South Pole. A small team, known as the Winterers, will remain at the Polaris VI Antarctic Research Station to continue their innovative research, a crucial part in the fight against climate change.

name: Lark Rise to Candleford
summary_text: An adaptation of Flora Thompson's autobiographical novel "Lark Rise To Candleford", set in 19 century Oxfordshire, in which a young girl moves to the local market town to begin an apprenticeship as a postmistress.

name: Damage
summary_text: A member of Parliament falls passionately in love with his son's fiancée despite the dangers of discovery.

name: A Dog's Journey
summary_text: A dog finds the meaning of his own existence through the lives of the humans he meets.

name: Les Misérables
summary_text: Television adaptation of Victor Hugo's classic novel, which follows Jean Valjean as he evades capture by the unyielding Inspector Javert. Set against a backdrop of post-Napoleonic France as unrest begins to grip the city of Paris once more.

name: Filth
summary_text: A corrupt, junkie cop with bipolar disorder attempts to manipulate his way through a promotion in order to win back his wife and daughter while also fighting his own inner demons.

name: The Mission
summary_text: Eighteenth-century Spanish Jesuits try to protect a remote South American tribe in danger of falling under the rule of pro-slavery Portugal.

name: The Banker
summary_text: In the 1960s two African-American entrepreneurs hire a working-class white man to pretend to be the head of their business empire while they pose as a janitor and chauffeur.

name: Misbehaviour
summary_text: A group of women hatch a plan to disrupt the 1970 Miss World beauty competition in London.

name: The Paperboy
summary_text: A reporter returns to his Florida hometown to investigate a case involving a death row inmate.

name: Stakeout
summary_text: Two detectives observe an escaped convict's ex-girlfriend, but complications set in when one of them falls for her.

name: The Hunted
summary_text: An FBI deep-woods tracker attempts to capture a trained assassin who has made a sport of hunting humans.

name: Bonding
summary_text: A New York City grad student moonlighting as a dominatrix enlists her gay BFF from high school to be her assistant.

name: It Could Happen to You
summary_text: A police officer promises to share his lottery ticket with a waitress in lieu of a tip.

name: Valley Girl
summary_text: Set to a new wave '80s soundtrack, a pair of young lovers from different backgrounds defy their parents and friends to stay together. A musical adaptation of the 1983 film.

name: Monster House
summary_text: Three teens discover that their neighbor's house is really a living, breathing, scary monster.

name: Dorian Gray
summary_text: A corrupt young man somehow keeps his youthful beauty eternally, but a special painting gradually reveals his inner ugliness to all.

name: Terms of Endearment
summary_text: Follows hard-to-please Aurora looking for love, and her daughter's family problems.

name: Mozart in the Jungle
summary_text: Love, money, ambition and music intertwine in Mozart in the Jungle, a half hour comedic drama that looks at finding yourself and finding love while conquering New York City. A brash new maestro Rodrigo stirs up the New York Symphony as young oboist Hailey hopes for her big chance.

name: High Anxiety
summary_text: A psychiatrist with intense acrophobia (fear of heights) goes to work for a mental institution run by doctors who appear to be crazier than their patients, and have secrets that they are willing to commit murder to keep.

name: McMafia
summary_text: Alex Godman has spent his life trying to escape the shadow of his family's past. But when a murder unearths their past, Alex is drawn into the criminal underworld where he must confront his values to protect those he loves.

name: Catwoman
summary_text: A shy woman, endowed with the speed, reflexes, and senses of a cat, walks a thin line between criminal and hero, even as a detective doggedly pursues her, fascinated by both of her personas.

name: Jack the Giant Slayer
summary_text: The ancient war between humans and a race of giants is reignited when Jack, a young farmhand fighting for a kingdom and the love of a princess, opens a gateway between the two worlds.

name: Gimme Gimme Gimme
summary_text: A sitcom about two dreamy London roommates: gay unemployed actor Tom Farrell, whose career is going nowhere; and Linda La Hughes, who is about as attractive as a 100-year-old nun, yet has ...                See full summary »

name: Adult Night
summary_text: In an attempt to "live colorfully," the strength of a couple's relationship is tested by a situation where it might be more important to get out rather than get off.

name: Hart to Hart
summary_text: The globe-trotting adventures of amateur detectives Jonathan and Jennifer Hart.

name: Harriet
summary_text: The extraordinary tale of Harriet Tubman's escape from slavery and transformation into one of America's greatest heroes, whose courage, ingenuity, and tenacity freed hundreds of slaves and changed the course of history.

name: Klaus
summary_text: A simple act of kindness always sparks another, even in a frozen, faraway place. When Smeerensburg's new postman, Jesper, befriends toymaker Klaus, their gifts melt an age-old feud and deliver a sleigh full of holiday traditions.

name: Rifkin's Festival
summary_text: A married American couple go to the San Sebastian Festival and get caught up in the magic of the event, the beauty and charm of the city and the fantasy of movies.

name: Sommersby
summary_text: A farmer returns home from the Civil War, but his wife begins to suspect that the man is an impostor.

name: Havoc
summary_text: Two affluent suburban girls clash with the Latino gang culture of East Los Angeles.

name: Underbelly
summary_text: Each season of this multi award winning Television series takes you through a 13 episode run in the rise and fall of real life Australian underworld figures as told from both sides of the law.

name: Camp Nowhere
summary_text: A group of junior high kids don't want to go to summer camps chosen by their parents. They make their own adult-free camp and "hire" an ex drama teacher to help.

name: Fullmetal Alchemist
summary_text: When a failed alchemical ritual leaves brothers Edward and Alphonse Elric with severely damaged bodies, they begin searching for the one thing that can save them; the fabled philosopher's stone.

name: Finding Neverland
summary_text: The story of Sir J.M. Barrie's friendship with a family who inspired him to create Peter Pan.

name: Fame
summary_text: A chronicle of the lives of several teenagers who attend a New York high school for students gifted in the performing arts.

name: Dragonball Evolution
summary_text: The young warrior Son Goku sets out on a quest, racing against time and the vengeful King Piccolo, to collect a set of seven magical orbs that will grant their wielder unlimited power.

name: Life Itself
summary_text: As a young New York City couple goes from college romance to marriage and the birth of their first child, the unexpected twists of their journey create reverberations that echo over continents and through lifetimes.

name: The Carol Burnett Show
summary_text: Television show featuring skits by Carol Burnett and her comedy troupe.

name: The Crime of the Century
summary_text: A searing indictment of Big Pharma and the political operatives and government regulations that enable over-production, reckless distribution and abuse of synthetic opiates.

name: I Spit on Your Grave
summary_text: An aspiring writer is repeatedly gang-raped, humiliated, and left for dead by four men whom she systematically hunts down to seek revenge.

name: Walkabout
summary_text: Two city-bred siblings are stranded in the Australian Outback, where they learn to survive with the aid of an Aboriginal boy on his "walkabout": a ritual separation from his tribe.

name: A Nightmare on Elm Street
summary_text: The spectre of a disfigured man haunts the children of the parents who murdered him, stalking and killing them in their dreams.

name: Billionaire Boys Club
summary_text: A group of wealthy boys in Los Angeles during the early 1980s establish a 'get-rich-quick' scam that turns deadly.

name: NewsRadio
summary_text: The workplace sitcom "NewsRadio" explores the office politics and interpersonal relationships among the staff of WNYX NewsRadio, New York's #2 news radio station.

name: The Invention of Lying
summary_text: A comedy set in a world where no one has ever lied, until a writer seizes the opportunity for personal gain.

name: I, Sniper
summary_text: In the fall of 2002, 17-year-old Lee Malvo and Gulf War veteran John Muhammad terrorized the D.C. region with a series of random shootings from inside the trunk of a blue Chevy Caprice, killing 10 people and injuring three.

name: Three Days of the Condor
summary_text: A bookish CIA researcher finds all his co-workers dead, and must outwit those responsible until he figures out who he can really trust.

name: Gold
summary_text: Kenny Wells, a prospector desperate for a lucky break, teams up with a similarly eager geologist and sets off on a journey to find gold in the uncharted jungle of Indonesia.

name: Veneno
summary_text: A biographical story of La Veneno, transgender icon and TV personality, and those who surrounded her.

name: Phantom of the Rue Morgue
summary_text: When several women are found mutilated and murdered, the Paris police are baffled as to who the killer may be. All evidence points to Dupin, but soon it becomes apparent that it is someone (or something) stronger and deadlier than a human.

name: In the Mouth of Madness
summary_text: An insurance investigator begins discovering that the impact a horror writer's books have on his fans is more than inspirational.

name: Hang 'Em High
summary_text: When an innocent man barely survives a lynching, he returns as a lawman determined to bring the vigilantes to justice.

name: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Dog Days
summary_text: School's out. Summer vacation is on. However, Greg may not have the best summer vacation ever. What could go wrong?

name: Love Child
summary_text: The lives of staff and residents at the fictional Kings Cross Hospital and Stanton House in Sydney in 1969.

name: Stealing Beauty
summary_text: After her mother commits suicide, a young woman travels to Italy in search of love, truth and a deeper connection with herself.

name: Lovelace
summary_text: The story of Linda Lovelace, who is used and abused by the porn industry at the behest of her coercive husband before taking control of her life.

name: Untitled Guy Ritchie Film
summary_text: An agent is recruited by a global intelligence alliance to track down and stop the sale of a deadly weapons technology that threatens to disrupt the world order.

name: Meet the Blacks
summary_text: As Carl Black gets the opportunity to move his family out of Chicago in hope of a better life, their arrival in Beverly Hills is timed with that city's annual purge, where all crime is legal for twelve hours.

name: Peter Pan & Wendy
summary_text: Live-action adaptation of J.M. Barrie's classic tale of a boy who wouldn't grow up and recruits three young siblings in London to join him on a magical adventure to the enchanted Neverland island.

name: Lovesick
summary_text: After finding out he has an STD, Dylan must get back in touch with every girl he has ever had sex with to let them know the bad news.

name: Awkward.
summary_text: An unpopular 15-year-old gains immediate, yet unwanted, popularity at her high school when the student body mistakes an accident she has for a suicide attempt.

name: Baby
summary_text: A coming-of-age story that explores the unseen lives of Roman high schoolers. Loosely inspired by a true story, the series follows a group of Parioli teenagers as they defy society in their search for identity and independence

name: Girlfriends' Guide to Divorce
summary_text: Follows a best-selling author of a self-help book series who hides her recent separation as she starts to navigate her life as a single woman in her 40s in Los Angeles.

name: The Young Pope
summary_text: The beginning of the pontificate of Lenny Belardo, alias Pius XIII, the first American Pope in history.

name: Vanguard
summary_text: Covert security company Vanguard is the last hope of survival for an accountant after he is targeted by the world's deadliest mercenary organization.

name: Zebra Girl
summary_text: Catherine's seemingly perfect rural life is turned upside down after she discovers her husband is hiding a dark secret that leads her to the unthinkable. Murder.

name: Mad Max Beyond Thunderdome
summary_text: After being exiled from the most advanced town in post apocalyptic Australia, a drifter travels with a group of abandoned children to rebel against the town's queen.

name: Troy: Fall of a City
summary_text: Retells the story of the 10 year siege of Troy, which occurred in the 12 or 13th century BC.

name: Fright Night
summary_text: When a nice new neighbor moves in next door, Charley discovers that he is an ancient vampire who preys on the community. Can he save his neighborhood from the creature with the help of the famous "vampire killer", Peter Vincent?

name: Miss Bala
summary_text: Gloria finds a power she never knew she had when she is drawn into a dangerous world of cross-border crime. Surviving will require all of her cunning, inventiveness, and strength. Based on the Spanish-language film.

name: Mod Squad
summary_text: A trio of reformed juvenile delinquents work as undercover cops.

name: My Teacher, My Obsession
summary_text: Riley struggles to meet friends after transferring to a new high school where her father is an English teacher. When she meets Kyla, a fellow loner, they become close friends until Riley learns that Kyla is obsessed with her father.

name: Wu Assassins
summary_text: A warrior chosen as the latest and last Wu Assassin must search for the powers of an ancient triad and restore balance in San Francisco's Chinatown.

name: The White House Plumbers
summary_text: A five-part series that tells the true story of how Nixon's own political saboteurs and Watergate masterminds, E. Howard Hunt and G. Gordon Liddy, accidentally toppled the presidency they were trying to protect.

name: White Boy Rick
summary_text: The story of teenager Richard Wershe Jr., who became an undercover informant for the FBI during the 1980s and was ultimately arrested for drug-trafficking and sentenced to life in prison.

name: Synecdoche, New York
summary_text: A theatre director struggles with his work, and the women in his life, as he creates a life-size replica of New York City inside a warehouse as part of his new play.
